name: Crazy Aliens 2020
description:
Crazy Aliens 2020 is inspired by the classic 1979 Space Invaders; complete with vast arrays of fire powers with tens of thousands of aliens everywhere.  Features over 100 levels, bonus levels and a story line that covers the entirety of known space.  Filled with humour, intergalactic madness.  Addictive from the offset with plenty of wow factor as levels progress.  Comes with 2 player co-op mode, hi-score chart, shops and cheats.

Well worth ten of your Earth dollars.
